00047 /*
00048  *  Reset USB Core
00049  *    Parameters:      None
00050  *    Return Value:    None
00051  */
00052 
00053 void USB_ResetCore (void) {
00054 
00055   USB_DeviceStatus  = USB_POWER;
00056   USB_DeviceAddress = 0;
00057   USB_Configuration = 0;
00058   USB_EndPointMask  = 0x00010001;
00059   USB_EndPointHalt  = 0x00000000;
00060 }

00063 /*
00064  *  USB Request - Setup Stage
00065  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00066  *    Return Value:    None
00067  */
00068 
00069 void USB_SetupStage (void) {
00070   USB_ReadEP(0x00, (BYTE *)&SetupPacket);
00071   //Log
00072 //  PLog("SetupStage");
00073   //Log
00074 }

00076 
00077 /*
00078  *  USB Request - Data In Stage
00079  *    Parameters:      None (global EP0Data)
00080  *    Return Value:    None
00081  */
00082 
00083 void USB_DataInStage (void) {
00084   DWORD cnt;
00085 
00086   if (EP0Data.Count > USB_MAX_PACKET0) {
00087     cnt = USB_MAX_PACKET0;
00088   } else {
00089     cnt = EP0Data.Count;
00090   }
00091   cnt = USB_WriteEP(0x80, EP0Data.pData, cnt);
00092   EP0Data.pData += cnt;
00093   EP0Data.Count -= cnt;
00094   //Log
00095 //  PLog("DaTaInStage");
00096   //Log
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 /*
00101  *  USB Request - Data Out Stage
00102  *    Parameters:      None (global EP0Data)
00103  *    Return Value:    None
00104  */
00105 
00106 void USB_DataOutStage (void) {
00107   DWORD cnt;
00108 
00109   cnt = USB_ReadEP(0x00, EP0Data.pData);
00110   EP0Data.pData += cnt;
00111   EP0Data.Count -= cnt;
00112   //Log
00113 //  PLog("DaTaOutStage");
00114   //Log
00115 }

00147 /*
00148  *  Get Status USB Request
00149  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00150  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00151  */
00152 
00153 __inline BOOL USB_GetStatus (void) {
00154   DWORD n, m;
00155 
00156   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00157     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00158       EP0Data.pData = (BYTE *)&USB_DeviceStatus;
00159       USB_DataInStage();
00160       break;
00161     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00162       if ((USB_Configuration != 0) && (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L < USB_NumInterfaces)) {
00163         *((__packed WORD *)EP0Buf) = 0;
00164         EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;
00165         USB_DataInStage();
00166       } else {
00167         return (FALSE);
00168       }
00169       break;
00170     case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
00171       n = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L & 0x8F;
00172       m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00173       if (((USB_Configuration != 0) || ((n & 0x0F) == 0)) && (USB_EndPointMask & m)) {
00174         *((__packed WORD *)EP0Buf) = (USB_EndPointHalt & m) ? 1 : 0;
00175         EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;
00176         USB_DataInStage();
00177       } else {
00178         return (FALSE);
00179       }
00180       break;
00181     default:
00182       return (FALSE);
00183   }
00184   return (TRUE);
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 /*
00189  *  Set/Clear Feature USB Request
00190  *    Parameters:      sc:    0 - Clear, 1 - Set
00191  *                            None (global SetupPacket)
00192  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00193  */
00194 
00195 __inline BOOL USB_SetClrFeature (DWORD sc) {
00196   DWORD n, m;
00197 
00198   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00199     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00200       if (SetupPacket.wValue.W == USB_FEATURE_REMOTE_WAKEUP) {
00201         if (sc) {
00202           USB_WakeUpCfg(TRUE);
00203           USB_DeviceStatus |=  USB_GETSTATUS_REMOTE_WAKEUP;
00204         } else {
00205           USB_WakeUpCfg(FALSE);
00206           USB_DeviceStatus &= ~USB_GETSTATUS_REMOTE_WAKEUP;
00207         }
00208       } else {
00209         return (FALSE);
00210       }
00211       break;
00212     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00213       return (FALSE);
00214     case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
00215       n = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L & 0x8F;
00216       m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00217       if ((USB_Configuration != 0) && ((n & 0x0F) != 0) && (USB_EndPointMask & m)) {
00218         if (SetupPacket.wValue.W == USB_FEATURE_ENDPOINT_STALL) {
00219           if (sc) {
00220             USB_SetStallEP(n);
00221             USB_EndPointHalt |=  m;
00222           } else {
00223             USB_ClrStallEP(n);
00224             USB_EndPointHalt &= ~m;
00225           }
00226         } else {
00227           return (FALSE);
00228         }
00229       } else {
00230         return (FALSE);
00231       }
00232       break;
00233     default:
00234       return (FALSE);
00235   }
00236   return (TRUE);
00237 }
00238 
00239 
00240 /*
00241  *  Get Descriptor USB Request
00242  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00243  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00244  */
00245 
00246 __inline BOOL USB_GetDescriptor (void) {
00247   BYTE  *pD;
00248   DWORD len, n;
00249 
00250   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00251     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00252       switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00253         case USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00254           EP0Data.pData = (BYTE *)USB_DeviceDescriptor;
00255           len = USB_DEVICE_DESC_SIZE;
00256           break;
00257         case USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00258           pD = (BYTE *)USB_ConfigDescriptor;
00259           for (n = 0; n != SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L; n++) {
00260             if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bLength != 0) {
00261               pD += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00262             }
00263           }
00264           if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bLength == 0) {
00265             return (FALSE);
00266           }
00267           EP0Data.pData = pD;
00268           len = ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00269           break;
00270         case USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00271           EP0Data.pData = (BYTE *)USB_StringDescriptor + SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L;
00272           len = ((USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR *)EP0Data.pData)->bLength;
00273           break;
00274         default:
00275           return (FALSE);
00276       }
00277       break;
00278     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00279       switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00280 #if USB_HID
00281         case HID_HID_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00282           if (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L != USB_HID_IF_NUM) {
00283             return (FALSE);    /* Only Single HID Interface is supported */
00284           }
00285           EP0Data.pData = (BYTE *)USB_ConfigDescriptor + HID_DESC_OFFSET;
00286           len = HID_DESC_SIZE;
00287           break;
00288         case HID_REPORT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00289           if (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L != USB_HID_IF_NUM) {
00290             return (FALSE);    /* Only Single HID Interface is supported */
00291           }
00292           EP0Data.pData = (BYTE *)HID_ReportDescriptor;
00293           len = HID_ReportDescSize;
00294           break;
00295         case HID_PHYSICAL_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00296           return (FALSE);      /* HID Physical Descriptor is not supported */
00297 #endif
00298         default:
00299           return (FALSE);
00300       }
00301       break;
00302     default:
00303       return (FALSE);
00304   }
00305 
00306   if (EP0Data.Count > len) {
00307     EP0Data.Count = len;
00308   }
00309   USB_DataInStage();
00310 
00311   return (TRUE);
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00315 /*
00316  *  Set Configuration USB Request
00317  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00318  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00319  */
00320 
00321 __inline BOOL USB_SetConfiguration (void) {
00322   USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *pD;
00323   DWORD                  alt, n, m;
00324 
00325   if (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00326     pD = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)USB_ConfigDescriptor;
00327     while (pD->bLength) {
00328       switch (pD->bDescriptorType) {
00329         case USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00330           if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bConfigurationValue == SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00331             USB_Configuration = SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L;
00332             USB_NumInterfaces = ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bNumInterfaces;
00333             for (n = 0; n < USB_IF_NUM; n++) {
00334               USB_AltSetting[n] = 0;
00335             }
00336             for (n = 1; n < 16; n++) {
00337               if (USB_EndPointMask & (1 << n)) {
00338                 USB_DisableEP(n);
00339               }
00340               if (USB_EndPointMask & ((1 << 16) << n)) {
00341                 USB_DisableEP(n | 0x80);
00342               }
00343             }
00344             USB_EndPointMask = 0x00010001;
00345             USB_EndPointHalt = 0x00000000;
00346             USB_Configure(TRUE);
00347             if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bmAttributes & USB_CONFIG_SELF_POWERED) {
00348               USB_DeviceStatus |=  USB_GETSTATUS_SELF_POWERED;
00349             } else {
00350               USB_DeviceStatus &= ~USB_GETSTATUS_SELF_POWERED;
00351             }
00352           } else {
00353             (BYTE *)pD += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00354             continue;
00355           }
00356           break;
00357         case USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00358           alt = ((USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bAlternateSetting;
00359           break;
00360         case USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00361           if (alt == 0) {
00362             n = ((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bEndpointAddress & 0x8F;
00363             m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00364             USB_EndPointMask |= m;
00365             USB_ConfigEP((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD);
00366             USB_EnableEP(n);
00367             USB_ResetEP(n);
00368           }
00369           break;
00370       }
00371       (BYTE *)pD += pD->bLength;
00372     }
00373   }
00374   else {
00375     USB_Configuration = 0;
00376     for (n = 1; n < 16; n++) {
00377       if (USB_EndPointMask & (1 << n)) {
00378         USB_DisableEP(n);
00379       }
00380       if (USB_EndPointMask & ((1 << 16) << n)) {
00381         USB_DisableEP(n | 0x80);
00382       }
00383     }
00384     USB_EndPointMask  = 0x00010001;
00385     USB_EndPointHalt  = 0x00000000;
00386     USB_Configure(FALSE);
00387   }
00388 
00389   if (USB_Configuration == SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00390     return (TRUE);
00391   } else {
00392     return (FALSE);
00393   }
00394 }
00395

00398 
00399 /*
00400  *  Set Interface USB Request
00401  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00402  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00403  */
00404 
00405 __inline BOOL USB_SetInterface (void) {
00406   USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *pD;
00407   DWORD                  ifn, alt, old, msk, n, m;
00408   BOOL                   set;
00409 
00410   if (USB_Configuration == 0) return (FALSE);
00411 
00412   set = FALSE;
00413   pD  = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)USB_ConfigDescriptor;
00414   while (pD->bLength) {
00415     switch (pD->bDescriptorType) {
00416       case USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00417         if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bConfigurationValue != USB_Configuration) {
00418           (BYTE *)pD += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00419           continue;
00420         }
00421         break;
00422       case USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00423         ifn = ((USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bInterfaceNumber;
00424         alt = ((USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bAlternateSetting;
00425         msk = 0;
00426         if ((ifn == SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L) && (alt == SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L)) {
00427           set = TRUE;
00428           old = USB_AltSetting[ifn];
00429           USB_AltSetting[ifn] = (BYTE)alt;
00430         }
00431         break;
00432       case USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00433         if (ifn == SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L) {
00434           n = ((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bEndpointAddress & 0x8F;
00435           m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00436           if (alt == SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00437             USB_EndPointMask |=  m;
00438             USB_EndPointHalt &= ~m;
00439             USB_ConfigEP((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD);
00440             USB_EnableEP(n);
00441             USB_ResetEP(n);
00442             msk |= m;
00443           }
00444           else if ((alt == old) && ((msk & m) == 0)) {
00445             USB_EndPointMask &= ~m;
00446             USB_EndPointHalt &= ~m;
00447             USB_DisableEP(n);
00448           }
00449         }
00450         break;
00451     }
00452     (BYTE *)pD += pD->bLength;
00453   }
00454   return (set);
00455 }
00456 
00457 
00458 /*
00459  *  USB Endpoint 0 Event Callback
00460  *    Parameter:       event
00461  */
00462 
00463 void USB_EndPoint0 (DWORD event) {
00464 
00465   switch (event) {
00466 
00467     case USB_EVT_SETUP:
00468 
00469         //Log
00470 //      PLog("USB_EVT_SETUP");
00471         //Log
00472 
00473      USB_SetupStage();
00474      USB_DirCtrlEP(SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Dir);
00475 
00476 
00477       EP0Data.Count = SetupPacket.wLength;
00478       switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Type) {
00479 
00480         case REQUEST_STANDARD:
00481           switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00482                 case USB_REQUEST_GET_STATUS:
00483               if (!USB_GetStatus()) {
00484                 goto stall_i;
00485               }
00486               break;
00487 
00488         
00489             case USB_REQUEST_CLEAR_FEATURE:
00490               if (!USB_SetClrFeature(0)) {
00491                 goto stall_i;
00492               }
00493 
00494                   USB_StatusInStage();
00495 #if USB_FEATURE_EVENT
00496               USB_Feature_Event();
00497 #endif
00498               break;
00499                                 
00500         
00501             case USB_REQUEST_SET_FEATURE:
00502               if (!USB_SetClrFeature(1)) {
00503                 goto stall_i;
00504               }
00505               USB_StatusInStage();
00506 #if USB_FEATURE_EVENT
00507               USB_Feature_Event();
00508 #endif
00509               break;
00510 
00511                 
00512             case USB_REQUEST_SET_ADDRESS:
00513               switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00514                 case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00515                   USB_DeviceAddress = 0x80 | SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L;
00516                   USB_StatusInStage();
00517                   break;
00518                 default:
00519                   goto stall_i;
00520               }
00521               break;
00522 
00523         
00524             case USB_REQUEST_GET_DESCRIPTOR:
00525               if (!USB_GetDescriptor()) {
00526                 goto stall_i;
00527               }
00528               break;
00529 
00530 
00531             case USB_REQUEST_SET_DESCRIPTOR:
00532 /*stall_o:*/  USB_SetStallEP(0x00);
00533               EP0Data.Count = 0;
00534               break;
00535 
00536 
00537             case USB_REQUEST_GET_CONFIGURATION:
00538               switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00539                 case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00540                   EP0Data.pData = &USB_Configuration;
00541                   USB_DataInStage();
00542                   break;
00543                 default:
00544                   goto stall_i;
00545               }
00546               break;
00547                 
00548         
00549             case USB_REQUEST_SET_CONFIGURATION:
00550               switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00551 
00552 
00553                 case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00554                   if (!USB_SetConfiguration()) {
00555                     goto stall_i;
00556                   }
00557                   USB_StatusInStage();
00558 #if USB_CONFIGURE_EVENT
00559                   USB_Configure_Event();
00560 #endif
00561                   break;
00562                 default:
00563                   goto stall_i;
00564               }
00565               break;
00566 
00567 
00568             case USB_REQUEST_GET_INTERFACE:
00569               switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00570                 case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00571                   if ((USB_Configuration != 0) &&
00572                       (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L < USB_NumInterfaces)) {
00573                     EP0Data.pData = USB_AltSetting + SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L;
00574                     USB_DataInStage();
00575                   } else {
00576                     goto stall_i;
00577                   }
00578                   break;
00579                 default:
00580                   goto stall_i;
00581               }
00582               break;
00583 
00584 
00585 
00586             case USB_REQUEST_SET_INTERFACE:
00587                    switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00588                 case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00589                   if (!USB_SetInterface()) {
00590                     goto stall_i;
00591                   }
00592                   USB_StatusInStage();
00593 #if USB_INTERFACE_EVENT
00594                   USB_Interface_Event();
00595 #endif
00596                   break;
00597                 default:
00598                   goto stall_i;
00599               }
00600               break;
00601 
00602             default:
00603               goto stall_i;
00604 
00605           }
00606           break;
00607 
00608 //Neo handle
00609         case REQUEST_CLASS:
00610                         goto stall_i;
00611 
00612         case REQUEST_VENDOR:
00613                         if(!(VendorSetupStage(&SetupPacket)))
00614                                 goto stall_i;
00615                         break;
00616        
00617         default:
00618 stall_i:  USB_SetStallEP(0x80);
00619           EP0Data.Count = 0;
00620           break;
00621 
00622       }
00623       break;
00624          //Neo
00625      case USB_EVT_OUT:
00626 
00627          //LOg
00628 //        PLog("USB_EVT_OUT");
00629          //Log
00630          if (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Dir == 0) {
00631         if(EP0Data.Count) {
00632           USB_DataOutStage();
00633           if (EP0Data.Count == 0) {
00634             switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Type) {
00635               case REQUEST_STANDARD:
00636                 goto stall_i;
00637                                 
00638                           case REQUEST_VENDOR:
00639                                 VendorDataStage(&SetupPacket);
00640                                 return;            //
00641                         
00642                           default:
00643                 goto stall_i;
00644             }
00645             USB_StatusInStage();
00646           }
00647         }
00648       } else {
00649         USB_StatusOutStage();  //Nhan dc token OUT
00650       }
00651       break;
00652 
00653     case USB_EVT_IN:
00654         
00655         //Log                                     
00656 //      PLog("USB_EVT_IN");
00657         //Log
00658         
00659       if (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Dir == 1) {      //Truyen tiep du lieu
00660            
00661         USB_DataInStage();
00662           }
00663           else 
00664           {
00665                 
00666         if (USB_DeviceAddress & 0x80) {
00667           USB_DeviceAddress &= 0x7F;
00668           USB_SetAddress(USB_DeviceAddress);
00669         }
00670                 else
00671                         USB_StatusOutStage();  //Update
00672       }
00673       break;
00674 
00675     case USB_EVT_IN_STALL:
00676       USB_ClrStallEP(0x80);
00677       break;
00678 
00679     case USB_EVT_OUT_STALL:
00680       USB_ClrStallEP(0x00);
00681       break;
00682   }
00683 }
